pages.text: Alcohol has use in $(l:throwables/molotov)molotovs$(), but of course, you can also drink it.$(br2)Doing so will make you drunk. Being drunk has its benefits though, between a damage boost and resistance. But of course it also has its weaknesses, which comes in the form of nausea. Good luck with bar brawling!
